item.title: The names of !nanni's relations
item.summary: The names of !nanni's mother and father and his grandparents.
item.comments: 1) See also The names of !nanni's brothers and sisters, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: the names of his close relations
of !nanni's mother and father and his grandparents
